au.com.cybersearch2.classydb

Class DatabaseWork

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classydb.DatabaseWork
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NativeScriptDatabaseWork

    public abstract class DatabaseWork
extends Object
    DatabaseWork Sub classes perform native database transactions
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 28/06/2014

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Boolean result
      Work result type is Boolean to indicate success or failure
      protected javax.persistence.EntityTransaction transaction
      Transaction object with pre-commit callback used to perform work (actually ClassyEntityTransaction class)
